ABOUT MYSELF

Give me your time to start the manipulation on you...

YOUR LIFE IS IN SAFE HANDS

The unexamined life is not worth living. Whereof one cannot speak, thereof one must be silent. Entities should not be multiplied unnecessarily. The life of man (in a state of nature) is solitary, poor, nasty, brutish, and short.

FIRST AWARD

He who thinks great thoughts, often makes great errors

SECOND AWARD

There is but one truly serious philosophical problem, and that is suicide

THIRD AWARD

The greatest happiness of the greatest number is the foundation of morals and legislation
